summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement to Pacific Northwest Bell Telephone Company across the City of Seattle Light Department's PNT transmission line right-of-way in the northwest quarter of Section 31, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., King County, Washington (vicinity 105th Street and Fremont Avenue North (P.M. \#260431-2-301).
